pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:0.5: 78. The second training rule on not giving the full ordination to trainee nuns
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.2: a trainee nun went to the nun Thullanandā and asked her for the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.3: Thullanandā told her, “Venerable, if you follow me for two years, I’ll give you the full ordination.” But she neither gave her the full ordination, nor made any effort to get her fully ordained.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.4: That trainee nun told the nuns what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.5: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.6: “How could Venerable Thullanandā tell a trainee nun,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.7: ‘Venerable, if you follow me for two years, I’ll give you the full ordination,’ and then neither give her the full ordination, nor make any effort to get her fully ordained?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.12: How can the nun Thullanandā tell a trainee nun,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.13: ‘Venerable, if you follow me for two years, I’ll give you the full ordination,’ and then neither give her the full ordination, nor make any effort to get her fully ordained?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.14: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.15: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.16: ‘If a nun tells a trainee nun, “Venerable, if you follow me for two years, I’ll give you the full ordination,” but she then neither gives her the full ordination nor makes any effort to get her fully ordained, then, if there was no obstruction, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.6: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.7: Venerable, if you follow me for two years:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.8: if you attend on me for two years.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.9: I’ll give you the full ordination:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.10: I’ll give you the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.13: Neither gives her the full ordination:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.14: she does not herself give her the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.15: Nor makes any effort to get her fully ordained:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.16: she does not ask anyone else to give her the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.17: If she thinks, “I’ll neither give her the full ordination nor make any effort to get her fully ordained,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.20: if she searches for someone to give her the full ordination, but is unable to find anyone;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.24: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.25: The eighth training rule is finished.
